mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, HAIR_NUMBER, HAIR_NAME, HAIR_FILE_NUMBER, HAIR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, HAIR_FILE_UUID, HAIR_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, H.HAIR_NUMBER, HAIR_NAME, HAIR_FILE_NUMBER, HAIR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, HAIR_FILE_UUID, HAIR_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_HAIR H LEFT JOIN ( SELECT HAIR_FILE_NUMBER, HAIR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH,HAIR_FILE_UUID, HAIR_FILE_NAME, HAIR_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT HAIR_FILE_NUMBER, HAIR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH,HAIR_FILE_UUID, HAIR_FILE_NAME, HAIR_NUMBER, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY HAIR_NUMBER ORDER BY HAIR_FILE_NUMBER) RK FROM TBL_HAIR_FILE HF ) TMP WHERE RK = 1 ) J ON H.HAIR_NUMBER = J.HAIR_NUMBER ) TMP2 WHERE RNUM = #{number}

SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NUMBER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_VIEW_CNT, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER, USER_NICKNAME, BOARD_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, BOARD_FILE_UUID, BOARD_FILE_NAME, USER_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, USER_FILE_UUID, USER_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BOARD_NUMBER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_VIEW_CNT, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NUMBER, USER_NICKNAME, BOARD_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, BOARD_FILE_UUID, BOARD_FILE_NAME, USER_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, USER_FILE_UUID, USER_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NUMBER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_VIEW_CNT, BOARD_CONTENT, B.USER_NUMBER, USER_NICKNAME, J.BOARD_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, J.BOARD_FILE_UUID, J.BOARD_FILE_NAME, UF.USER_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, UF.USER_FILE_UUID, UF.USER_FILE_NAME, B.BOARD_CATEGORY_NUMBER FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_BOARD B ON U.USER_NUMBER = B.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_FILE_NUMBER, BOARD_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, BOARD_FILE_UUID, BOARD_FILE_NAME, BOARD_NUMBER, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY BOARD_NUMBER ORDER BY BOARD_FILE_NUMBER) RK FROM TBL_BOARD_FILE ) J ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = J.BOARD_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_FILE UF ON U.USER_NUMBER = UF.USER_NUMBER ) S1 ) S2 WHERE RNUM = #{number}
